overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. The engagement across platforms shows a strong interest in topics related to computational social science, disinformation, and coordinated online behaviors.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to computational methods and social media analysis.
Discussions and studies about disinformation across platforms.
Updates on research grants, publications, and job opportunities.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts to maintain engagement across platforms.
Incorporate more visual content, such as infographics or videos, to increase engagement.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate with a focus on methodological discussions, which resonate well with the audience.
platformInsights.linkedin: High engagement, particularly on posts announcing research grants and job opportunities, suggesting a professional audience interested in academic and research developments.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
